blogPost.excerpt: We bought likely 2024 presidential candidates URLs. We broke each URL into 100 shares that we are now selling for $1 per share. You buy shares of the URLs you want, and if we sell it you get a cut of the money.
blogPost.body: We bought likely 2024 presidential candidates URLs. We broke each URL into 100 shares that we are now selling for $1 per share. You buy shares of the URLs you want, and if we sell it you get a cut of the money.
blogPost.title: In The Year 2024 - We have future presidents' domains - buy shares and get paid
blogPost.author: Daniel Greenberg

localize.description: 我们买了可能的2024年总统候选人的网址。我们把每个网址分成100股，现在以每股1美元的价格出售。你买了你想要的网址的股份，如果我们卖掉它，你就能得到分红。
localize.tagline: 我们有未来总统的域名--买股票就能获得报酬。

localize.description: 我們買了可能的2024年總統候選人的網址。我們把每個網址分成100股，現在以每股1美元的價格出售。你買了你想要的網址的股份，如果我們賣掉它，你就能得到分紅。
localize.tagline: 我們有未來總統的域名--買股票就能獲得報酬。

previous.excerpt: We collected 2.8m podcast connections according to the "Listeners Also Subscribed To" data in Apple Podcasts. Now you can vizualize any podcast's neighbours (and it's neighbour's neighbours) in a 3D graph and see which other podcasts share a similar audience.
previous.title: The Podcast Audience Graph - Visualize podcast audience connections in 3D.

localize.description: 我们根据Apple Podcasts中的 "听众也订阅 "数据收集了280万个播客连接。现在，你可以在3D图中直观地看到任何播客的邻居（以及它的邻居的邻居），并看到哪些其他播客有类似的听众。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式可视化播客的受众连接。

localize.description: 我們根據Apple Podcasts中的 "聽衆也訂閱 "數據收集了280萬個播客連接。現在，你可以在3D圖中直觀地看到任何播客的鄰居（以及它的鄰居的鄰居），並看到哪些其他播客有類似的聽衆。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式可視化播客的受衆連接。

next.excerpt: Ojoy enlarges low-resolution photos and memoji and improves their quality. It does this 100% in the browser client-side, thanks to some smarts from Upscaler and TensorFlow.js. The output is typically sharper compared to just resizing them.
next.title: Ojoy - Enlarge low-resolution images and improve their quality

localize.description: Ojoy可以放大低分辨率的照片和备忘录，并提高其质量。由于 Upscaler 和 TensorFlow.js 的一些智能，它 100% 在浏览器客户端实现了这一点。与仅仅调整它们的大小相比，输出的图像通常更加清晰。
localize.tagline: 放大低分辨率图像并提高其质量。

localize.description: Ojoy可以放大低分辨率的照片和備忘錄，並提高其質量。由於 Upscaler 和 TensorFlow.js 的一些智能，它 100% 在瀏覽器客戶端實現了這一點。與僅僅調整它們的大小相比，輸出的圖像通常更加清晰。
localize.tagline: 放大低分辨率圖像並提高其質量。
